summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that validates the scheduling componentâ€™s interaction with AWS Scheduler using mocked AWS services. It tests creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of schedules, handling of duplicate and missing schedules, start date logic, schedule group operations, tag application, and server API tag retrieval.
business_intent: Guarantee that the scheduling functionality works correctly across various scenarios, including edge cases and error conditions, before releasing to production, and provide confidence that tag management and server endpoints behave as expected.
